Hi THERE! I AM

< Erwin Seribo />

A Passionate Fullstack Software Developer

About me

I am a passionate fullstack software developer who love’s programming especially in ruby and nodejs language.

I have 10 years of experience in the IT industry as a software developer particularly in ruby on rails, graphql, shopify, api, docker, reactjs, angularjs and vuejs app development.

I am confident that I have the enough knowledge and skills to work on a project within a team or as one man team.

I am willing to learn and grow more.

Collaboration is one of my way to achieve the expected output and deliver it on time or earlier.

During my free time I join ruby meetups, hackathons and code camps outside of work as part of my growth and learning curve in my career.

My Career

I am a team player and a proactive developer who suggest and adapt new strategies or new technologies from co-developers or from technical meetups or seminars that can help to boost the development of the project.

I do follow to use and implement suggested best practices as of the current trend like Agile, git flow, DevOps, scrum, pair programming, open source and collaboration.

In my 10 years of my career I learned how the software development works from planning to implementation and testing until the deployment, support, new features and bug fixes phase.

As of now I am still love and eager to learn new technologies and strategies for me to grow more and be one of the best developer or be the next CTO in the future who will guide the development team.

My Location

I am based in the Philippines, I mostly work remotely and workng from home. I visit coffeeshop sometimes to change mode and had some coffee and continue to do my thing.

I am comfortable working from home and not coming in the office. I collaborate with the team online through slack, google meet, zoom or any other online communication platform.

I started working remotely when my third work offer work from home and during that time I discover that working not in the office will still work and productive.

Work schedule meetups sometimes to meet the team face to face and have bonding with them, talk about our stuff, collaborate closely and have some meals and after party after work.

When covid19 arise which changed most of our day to day routine, during that time I wasn't got affected as I am used to worked at home and not dealing with long hours of commuting and travel to office. I am still productive and still up to speed to deliver work.

Working from home is big challenge at the start, but in the long run I was able to disciplined myself and organized my day to day routine and learned to balance my work hours and personal hours.

My Tools

I am a mac user, I mostly work and finish my stuff using my favorite powerful macbook pro machine with double monitors and with all the tech set installed that I need.

I love working in a mac as it is durable and heavy duty which last for many years and can still keep up the system requirements of the tools that im using to develop apps.

A quality works requires quality equipments which matched my quality works and output.

Tech tools im using:

Im using sublime text 3 for my code editor sometimes rubymine or vscode.

Im using iterm and ohmyzsh for commandline tools.

Im using sequel pro and tableplus to navigate mysql or postgres databases.

Im using google chrome (web) and postman (api) to run apps.

Im mostly used slack, google meet and zoom to communicate at work and do meetings.
